item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

		for(int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) {
     if(npcType == i) {
			sendNpcChat2(c.getChat().Randomizer(), "", c.talkingNpc, "");
     }
}

If it’s not obvious what im doing…
im adding dialogue for ALL npcs.
How would I do this xD?
